name: Bean Souls Remastered
description:
bean souls remastered OUT NOW

play the original bean souls with better particles, animations and mechanics!

this game is a souls-like metroidvania.

in this game u can spend up to 10 hours!

and for people who liked the game... there is a boss in the settings who is extremly difficult!

play the original bean souls here: https://darkmoon-blade.itch.io/bean-souls
